title: Context-Based Science Learning Design in Emergency Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental leadership competencies as a manager
context.additional_context: Project-based learning for science field managers in digital device-provided environments, focusing on scenario-based learning design competencies under simulated emergency remote education situations (e.g., COVID-19-like conditions)

learning_goals: Participants can analyze cultural and technological constraints in designing science learning in emergency remote education environments and develop response strategies.
Participants can design digital learning materials for science topics by applying the Project-Based Learning (PBL) methodology.
Participants can develop a blended assessment system for learner engagement and performance evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
